title.narrative: OUTPUT 7: EBOLA - STRENGTHENED SUPPORT TO COMMUNITIES AFFECTED

sector.narrative: Provision of training of school communities e.g. parent teacher associations, school management committees
Sanitation - improving services in rural communities (except household water treatment and storage, moving up the ladder and strengthening sustainability)
